label: clinical_signal_03_dx_pain_management_trial_007
content:
## 2024-04-15 Daily Operations Summary

### Enrollment
- Total Enrolled: 95
- Active: 93
- Screen Failures Cumulative: 20
- Withdrawals Cumulative: 2

### Enrollment By Treatment Arm
- Multimodal: 31
- Standard: 31
- Placebo: 33

### Efficacy By Arm
- Multimodal VAS Pain Score Mean: 6.1
- Multimodal VAS Pain Score SD: 1.3
- Multimodal Morphine Equivalents (mg) Mean: 40.5
- Multimodal Morphine Equivalents (mg) SD: 11.2
- Multimodal Six Minute Walk Test (meters) Mean: 316.0
- Multimodal Six Minute Walk Test (meters) SD: 40.0
- Multimodal Grip Strength (kg) Mean: 24.4
- Multimodal Grip Strength (kg) SD: 4.1
- Multimodal Sleep Quality Index Mean: 5.0
- Multimodal Sleep Quality Index SD: 1.4
- Multimodal Rescue Medication Doses Per Week Mean: 4.5
- Multimodal Rescue Medication Doses Per Week SD: 2.0

- Standard VAS Pain Score Mean: 6.1
- Standard VAS Pain Score SD: 1.9
- Standard Morphine Equivalents (mg) Mean: 47.2
- Standard Morphine Equivalents (mg) SD: 11.8
- Standard Six Minute Walk Test (meters) Mean: 293.0
- Standard Six Minute Walk Test (meters) SD: 52.0
- Standard Grip Strength (kg) Mean: 20.1
- Standard Grip Strength (kg) SD: 5.0
- Standard Sleep Quality Index Mean: 4.3
- Standard Sleep Quality Index SD: 1.1
- Standard Rescue Medication Doses Per Week Mean: 6.0
- Standard Rescue Medication Doses Per Week SD: 2.2

- Placebo VAS Pain Score Mean: 6.9
- Placebo VAS Pain Score SD: 1.1
- Placebo Morphine Equivalents (mg) Mean: 49.6
- Placebo Morphine Equivalents (mg) SD: 7.3
- Placebo Six Minute Walk Test (meters) Mean: 268.0
- Placebo Six Minute Walk Test (meters) SD: 38.0
- Placebo Grip Strength (kg) Mean: 19.2
- Placebo Grip Strength (kg) SD: 3.5
- Placebo Sleep Quality Index Mean: 3.9
- Placebo Sleep Quality Index SD: 1.1
- Placebo Rescue Medication Doses Per Week Mean: 6.5
- Placebo Rescue Medication Doses Per Week SD: 2.3

### Physical Therapy
- Sessions Scheduled: 191
- Sessions Attended: 183
- Attendance Rate (%): 87.1

### Safety Labs
- Hemoglobin (g/dL) Mean: 13.8
- Hemoglobin (g/dL) SD: 0.9
- WBC (k) Mean: 7.1
- WBC (k) SD: 1.5
- Platelets (k) Mean: 221
- Platelets (k) SD: 46
- Serum Creatinine (mg/dL) Mean: 1.01
- Serum Creatinine (mg/dL) SD: 0.19
- Blood Glucose (mg/dL) Mean: 94.0
- Blood Glucose (mg/dL) SD: 13.0
- ESR (mm/hr) Mean: 24.0
- ESR (mm/hr) SD: 6.0

### Adverse Events
- AE ID: PM-AE-0728, Description: fatigue, Grade: 1, Relatedness: probably related, Resolved: true, Treatment Arm: standard
- AE ID: PM-AE-0797, Description: urinary retention, Grade: 1, Relatedness: probably related, Resolved: true, Treatment Arm: multimodal
- AE ID: PM-AE-0799, Description: urinary retention, Grade: 2, Relatedness: unlikely related, Resolved: true, Treatment Arm: standard

### Protocol Deviations
- PD ID: PM-PD-0725, Description: VAS assessment outside scheduled window, Severity: minor
- PD ID: PM-PD-0701, Description: Rescue medication log incomplete for 1 subject, Severity: minor

### Events
- Subject retention call completed for 24 overdue visits
- Blinded interim efficacy data compiled for DSMB

### Notes
- Week 7: Pain management assessments on track. 95 subjects enrolled across treatment arms. Functional outcomes within expected ranges.
